plot: A Winter Observed is the story of Michael as he visits his girlfriend Megan at college. There he must confront his fears that things between them have changed as they spend the day together...
title: A Winter Observed
plot_es: A Winter Observed is the story of Michael as he visits his girlfriend Megan at college. There he must confront his fears that things between them have changed as they spend the day together...
